arts.sum: Randal Kolo Muani is in the frame for a belated Premier League debut for Tottenham Hotspur against Aston Villa on Sunday. arts.ttl: Unai Emery attempts to fire up struggling Aston Villa superstar ahead of Spurs clash: ‘Of course it’s helping him’
arts.sum: Unai Emery has thrown his weight behind Morgan Rogers after a troubled start to the season for the Aston Villa forward. Villa underperformed as a team at the outset of the 2025/26 campaign but have gradually found their way, winning their last four games in all competitions before the October international break. arts.ttl: Tottenham & Aston Villa make enquiry for attacker Yasir Al-Rumayyan wants to sign for Newcastle
arts.sum: Vasco da Gama attacker Rayan has been linked with a move away from the club in recent weeks, and multiple Premier League clubs are keen on him. arts.ttl: Tottenham injury latest as Thomas Frank shares major blow before Aston Villa clash
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur host Aston Villa in the Premier League on Sunday afternoon, and Thomas Frank could be without as many as six players for the visit of Unai Emery's side

arts.ttl: Watkins fit for Spurs clash as Buendia, Sancho return and Villa sweat on Mings
arts.sum: Unai Emery expects Ollie Watkins to start v Tottenham after a leg knock, while Emi Buendia and Jadon Sancho are back in training. Tyrone Mings still faces a late check on fitness.
